label: Band Pass Filter
tooltip: A simple low-cut and high-cut equalizer, allowing you to get rid of low-end rumble or dampen high frequencies.

options.label: Bandpass Filter
options.tooltip: Cut off high and low frequencies, allowing only a specific frequency band to pass through. The left slider represents a low-cut filter and the right slider is a high-cut filter, trimming off all frequencies outside of their combined range.
